bioAsHtml: Nicolas Leroux is a senior architect and CEO at Lunatech, having joined in 2001. Nicolas was an expert early adopter of the Java Enterprise platform as well as the open-source technologies that gravitate around it. He is the co-founder of the Benelux JBoss User Group and the Riviera Java User Group . He also contributes to the open source frameworks he uses by committing patches. Since 2009, Nicolas has had a passion for the Play framework and is a core developer of its open-source project. He likes to code in Java, Scala, Kotlin and JS. Nicolas is a also a book author.
